OOC: Sorry for the delay in posting, real life did get in the way.

BIC: 

=
Tucson Prime could have easilly chosen his missile truck mode, and did the =
easy thing, by decimating the area inside the fortress.  But he knew if he =
did that, everyone he cared about, including Rodimus, would probably suffer=
 great damages.  He wasn't about to do that.  Night Shift could see just by=
 the way Tucson Prime was standing, as still as he was, and as solidly stan=
ced, that he was up to something and nothing too common either.  He always =
knew when he was using his sonar emitter, as he closes his eyes, simulating=
 his visually impaired sensation as all sonar equipment comes online at ful=
l tilt.  Extra sharp hearing, thermal sensory and touch sensory boards were=
 kicking in once more.  With his eyes closed, he knew his greatest of silen=
t weapons could be deployed.  He concentrates, and sends a frequency and at=
tempts to send a painful frequency that would only effect Decepticon and Pr=
edacon programming, to the point where he thought he could cause some minor=
 but bothersome malfunctions, giving them all time to escape safely, yet no=
t really causing any major damage.  Night Shift feels a slight vibration co=
ursing through his entire chassey.  And it was visible by the way he seemed=
 to move slightly without even having his engine on.

Tucson then addresses=
 everyone.

"Kup, you're forgiven.  Just don't let it happen again.  And Ro=
dimus, Just because trust is hard to earn, it doesnt mean I don't have fait=
h in your abilities.  Never lose touch of faith, for it will strengthen you=
 against weakness.  Now, for those of you not used to this, this may effect=
 you in some shape or form.  I appologize if it does.  I am not aiming this=
 attack on any of you.  Autobots, Maximals, brace yourselves.  I am going i=
nto full sonic sonar attack mode.  Starting in ten, nine, eight, seven, six=
, five, four, three, two... One... Deploying now."

Night Shift braces hims=
elf.

" Ohhh yeah, I bet these uglies didn't know ya had this under your ma=
nifold.  Heh, this kinda tickles my axles. "

While Tucson Prime works from=
 the inside, Rat Trap and Quickstride now try to work from the outside.  Ra=
t Trap transforms into his rodent form as Quickstride gets back into equine=
 form. They trot up to the fortress, and then start to feel something vibra=
ting through their bodies.  And then realize that it was far best to stay b=
ack.

" Woahh, feel that Quickstride?  That's somethn' only Wheels can do. =
Well, at least all it does is tickle my relays.."

He starts to giggle as d=
oes Quickstride.

" Aw geeze, that does tickle!  I can't stop laughing!"

Q=
uickstride falls on his back, stricken by laughter due to the ticklish feel=
ing he gets from Tucson's sonar emittier. Yet he was not the only one being=
 tickled by it.  Inside, Night Shift could barely keep himself from lauging=
.

" Aww maaan, big bot, whatever you're usn' it's don' a number on my rela=
ys, I can't stop laughn'!"  

Tucson replies.

" Well, it's not like I didn=
't warn you.  Good thing it's not hurting you."

A transmission comes from =
Rat Trap.

" Wheels, whatever you're do'n in there, ya gotta tone it down o=
r else we're gonna die laughn'!"
